notes.title: Legal disclaimer

notes.text: The Secvisogram provided by the Secvisogram project is not vulnerable by the CVE-2025-64718 in js-yaml as it is only used in development.
notes.title: Summary

notes.text: Secvisogram is a web tool for creating and editing security advisories in the CSAF 2.0 format
notes.title: Product description

publisher.name: Bundesamt f√ºr Sicherheit in der Informationstechnik

document.title: Secvisogram is not affected by the CVE-2025-64718 in js-yaml as it is only used in development

cwe.name: Improperly Controlled Modification of Object Prototype Attributes ('Prototype Pollution')

notes.text: In js-yaml 4.1.0, 4.0.0, and 3.14.1 and below, it's possible for an attacker to modify the prototype of the result of a parsed yaml document via prototype pollution (__proto__). All users who parse untrusted yaml documents may be impacted.
notes.title: CVE Description

threats.details: The js-yaml dependency is a transitive development dependency of the cypress-code-coverage library in the secvisogram app. The cypress-code-coverage is only used in the development. It is not part of the delivered secvisogram.
